text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to set up your phone on tumblr?
text.Response A:
Sure! Here's a quick guide on how to set up your phone on Tumblr:

1. Open the Tumblr app on your phone.
2. Tap the "Sign Up" button.
3. Enter your email address and create a password.
4. Tap the "Sign Up" button again.
5. Follow the prompts to complete the sign-up process.

Once you have an account, you can start posting and following other users. Have fun!
text.Response B: Tumblr is a very popular social media platform that is ideal for sharing text, photos, videos, and other media.  To set up your phone on Tumblr, you will first need to create a Tumblr account on your computer or phone.  Next, you will need to install the official Tumblr app on your phone.  Once the app is installed, you will need to log in to your Tumblr account and follow the instructions to set up your phone.  You will need to provide your phone’s information, such as the phone number and model, and you will also need to verify your phone number.  After you have set up your phone on Tumblr, you will be able to post text, photos, and videos from your phone directly to your Tumblr account.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

529.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to set up your phone on tumblr?

Response A

Sure! Here's a quick guide on how to set up your phone on Tumblr:

1. Open the Tumblr app on your phone.
2. Tap the "Sign Up" button.
3. Enter your email address and create a password.
4. Tap the "Sign Up" button again.
5. Follow the prompts to complete the sign-up process.

Once you have an account, you can start posting and following other users. Have fun!

Response B

Tumblr is a very popular social media platform that is ideal for sharing text, photos, videos, and other media. To set up your phone on Tumblr, you will first need to create a Tumblr account on your computer or phone. Next, you will need to install the official Tumblr app on your phone. Once the app is installed, you will need to log in to your Tumblr account and follow the instructions to set up your phone. You will need to provide your phone’s information, such as the phone number and model, and you will also need to verify your phone number. After you have set up your phone on Tumblr, you will be able to post text, photos, and videos from your phone directly to your Tumblr account.
